abstract: Hollywood has its red-carpet premieres. The N.F.L. has the opening kickoff celebration. For technology fans, Apple’s rollout of its latest devices is as good as it gets.
snippet: Hollywood has its red-carpet premieres. The N.F.L. has the opening kickoff celebration. For technology fans, Apple’s rollout of its latest devices is as good as it gets.
lead_paragraph: Update | 12:17 p.m. A commenter on the MacRumors forum reports that Steve Wozniak actually got his iPhone early this morning in California. Also updated to include information from local AT&T stores.
